title: Team building: How to motivate and manage people. V.1
brief_description: Presenter Mark Sanborn identifies, in this seminar presentation, the key qualities of effective teams. Part one: “Teamwork pays” looks at why it is so difficult to build a team, the 10 critical differences between a team and a group, and seven ways to find valuable team members. Part two: “Education and training” looks at the Hologarphic team approach, the four C’s of effective team-work: Commitment, Cooperation, Communication and Contribution, and five proven ideas for training your team.
